summary: Implements the core demographic engine for the simulation, initializing the population, assigning ages, sex, and residential districts, updating age‑related attributes over time, handling births and deaths (including instantaneous deaths), estimating background mortality from non‑disease causes, and providing logging of demographic events.
business_intent: To supply a realistic representation of population dynamics—age progression, mortality, and spatial distribution—so that downstream health and disease modules can operate on an accurate demographic baseline.
